title: Ford Cuts Its EV Losses, But Sets Its EV Transition Back
description:
Ford is killing the F-150 Lightning and US E-Transit models. No mention was made of the Mustang Mach E, but I wouldn’t get your hopes up too much. The market responded by increasing its share price. While it is discouraging to those of us supporting clean technology, the move made ... [continued]

The post Ford Cuts Its EV Losses, But Sets Its EV Transition Back appeared first on CleanTechnica.
